nodes.text: Senate Airlane Control was air control for the lanes around the Senate Building on Coruscant. They were especially active during the Battle of Coruscant in 19 BBY, halting any traffic without a valid authorization code as the Senate was restricted airspace.
Tobb Jadak and Reeze Duurmun encountered Senate Airlane Control on their comms as they piloted the Stellar Envoy toward the Senate Annex.
